website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for perming your hair at home that is gentle yet effective at producing beautiful curls without an overpowering odor.
pros: Produces firm, defined curls, and long-lasting results
Formulated with argan oil for added conditioning
Can be used on most hair types
cons: You may not have heard of the brand, but customers who have tried it rave about the results

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use. My hair is fine and straight, this perm works great on it and doesn't harm my hair. Low oder. Will not use anything else now.
customer_reviews.author: Grammyssunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and long-lasting results. I got the beach waves I wanted!! :)
customer_reviews.author: HTmami

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are on the inside of the box. It says wait 20 minutes for automatic timing and you don’t have to look at a test curl. Man if I read this I would before I bought it I wouldn’t have! I did have some frizz afterwards. I was so careful to roll with lots of paper and I used the large orange rods on my short hair. Won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Contents not complete so the product was unusable
customer_reviews.text: Packing was not included, just the opened perm box inside a larger box. The heat activator was loose in the outer box and half of it had spilled. Also, the small bottle, even if it had been full, was not the quantity of ounces that the perm box contents said it would be. I am afraid to even try to use this product since with so little heat activator, it probably won't work and might damage my hair. Seller indicates product can't be returned because it contains hazardous materials that can't be mailed. However, they mailed it to me. I no longer trust Amazon and especially not their independent sellers. Buyer beware. You may not get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent perm for thin post-chemo hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this perm. I have used it for years. I give them my daughter who also has very straight, no body hair and it works wonderfully. It's really easy to do. Just FYI....the instructions are printed inside on the box.
customer_reviews.author: A Little ol' gal from "Jaw-Ja"

customer_reviews.title: It works great and gives a nice long lasting curl
customer_reviews.text: I have the Jet Set EZ Curl curlers (also sold by Amazon) that I use with this perm. It works great and gives a nice long lasting curl.
customer_reviews.author: M A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Home perm!
customer_reviews.text: The perm is great! My hair has soft natural curls. Many people think curls are natural! Perm also last several months!
customer_reviews.author: judy  Klein

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, easy to use, fantastic results
customer_reviews.text: Gave my mother this perm, it was easy to use, gentle and the results were fantastic. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon jerome

customer_reviews.title: One 'n Only Exothermic Perm
customer_reviews.text: The One 'n Only Exothermic Perm, that I received, arrived very very fast, and in excellent condition. And the perm did a very good job, while being very gentle. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn Collins

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This a great product. No smell, I would recommend it for people with any hair types. I just keep coming back to this one. Tried lots.
customer_reviews.author: lisa bitler

customer_reviews.title: Where have to been all my life?!
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving myself permanents for years ( I'm old as dirt) My Walgreens doesn't sell permanents anymore so I thought I'd give this brand a try.....oh how I wish I had found this product years ago! No unpleasant smell, easy to use, delivered to my front door and the best part of lasted much longer than my old brand and was so gentle to my hair......thank you so much One 'n Only Exothermic Perm!! I just received my second One 'n Only this morning, can't wait to get started.....
customer_reviews.author: Marian J

customer_reviews.title: You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very good perm. Used it on impossible to curl hair that was thin and fine. Excellent , well defined curls, soft, not frizzy, retained the curl .
customer_reviews.author: LDROX

customer_reviews.title: First time and will buy this one again!
customer_reviews.text: I selected this perm for its properties and suitability for my Mom’s very straight and somewhat thin hair. I have never done this before and her hair turned out fantastic. There is an odor but it is not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline K Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This perm was easy - a bit of frizz - will try a bit larger rods next time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I used this perm to take out a perm. I permed my hair a few weeks back and for the life of me I couldn't get any product to help with frizz so I through in the towel and bought this to put in my hair and straighten the waves out. It worked perfectly and my hair is back to looking like normal.
customer_reviews.author: Knope2020

product_meta.title: One 'n Only Exothermic Perm
product_meta.description: One 'n Only Exothermic Perm uses a gentle, self-heating formula that delivers maximum curl formation, all while conditioning and moisturizing the hair to ensure shine and manageability. Exothermic Perm is for use on normal, tinted or resistant hair, and is for firm curls.
feature_bullets: Conditioning/moisturizing complex ensures shine and manageability
